title: 661-E
statement: E. Divisibility Checktime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test64 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputYou are given an array of integers. Check whether there exists a number in this array which is divisible by all other numbers in this array. Output1, if such a number exists, and0otherwise.InputThe only line of the input contains a list of space-separated integersai(1 ≤ai≤ 100) — elements of the array. The size of the array is between2and10, inclusive. Note that the size of the array is not given explicitly!OutputOutput1if there exists element of this array which is divisible by all other elements of the array, and0otherwise.ExamplesInput6 12 4Output1Input3 13Output0Input26 13 12Output0

processed.result: You are given a list of numbers.  Determine if there is a number in the list that is divisible by all the other numbers in the list. If such a number exists, output 1. Otherwise, output 0.
Given a list of numbers, determine if there is a number in the list that is divisible by all the other numbers in the list. If such a number exists, output 1; otherwise, output 0.
